MemoryInfobox.description: 'An olive wreath was placed on doors to signal the birth of a son. Then, the midwife would ask a message taken to the father and for a sacrifice to be made.'

General_Description: '''Olive Wreath''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra approached a midwife in need of help.
Section_Dialogue:
On the [[message board]], Kassandra noticed a call for help, posted by a midwife. *'''Note:'''
''If you are quick, I need help with several urgent tasks. I have [[drachma]]e.'' She sought out the midwife and spoke to her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You're the one who left the message on the board. What's going on?'' *'''Woman:''' ''I must arrange for an [[olive]] wreath to be placed on her door. The woman I attended has given birth to a son.'' |-|That's great.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''That's wonderful, midwife. And he is healthy? How is the mother?'' |-|This better be worth my time.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''How do I make drachmae from this news, midwife?'' *'''Woman:''' ''The mother and son are strong, so there is work to be done. The father is a commander – a message must be delivered to him.
And a sacrifice of [[goat]]s must be made to thank the gods.'' |-|Kill goats.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''Are you asking me to kill goats?'' *'''Woman:''' ''That's exactly it. Will you do it for me?'' ([ACCEPT] "I'll kill the beasts") *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll handle this.'' *'''Woman:''' ''I can rest my mind, then.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll be back when everything's been taken care of.'' ([LEAVE] "This isn't my concern") :Back to dialogue options. Kassandra went out and killed goats and returned. *'''Woman:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.'' *'''Woman:''' ''I owe more than words can say. But please, take this.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Happy to help.'' |-|Deliver a message.= *'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to deliver it to the Athenian commander.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Exactly. It must arrive without a scratch.'' (Accept – I'll handle it. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'm the one for the job.'' *'''Woman:''' ''I'm in your debt. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I should get going.'' Kassandra left the midwife and found the Athenian commander. *'''Kassandra:''' ''A midwife wanted you to have this.'' *'''Man:''' ''Thank you,'' misthios''! Here, this is for you.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the midwife as requested and received her reward.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
